thread.title: Berman: Domestic violence talk in Tallahasee has been ‘minimal’
thread.title_full: Berman: Domestic violence talk in Tallahasee has been ‘minimal’ | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Rick Christie
title: Berman: Domestic violence talk in Tallahasee has been ‘minimal’
text:
This time, a year ago, the news cycles and social media were abuzz with news about domestic violence.
The National Football League, behind incidents involving players like former Baltimore Ravens running back Ray Rice and Dallas Cowboys defensive end Greg Hardy , was reeling as it sought to calm the growing outrage over its perceived passivity.
